plot: A fleeting instant in filial relations shows us the way in which we transmit to our children and others the meaning we attribute to life. The eternal contradiction: to live to have a life ...
title: La cumbre
plot_es: A fleeting instant in filial relations shows us the way in which we transmit to our children and others the meaning we attribute to life. The eternal contradiction: to live to have a life ...
plot_en: A fleeting instant in filial relations shows us the way in which we transmit to our children and others the meaning we attribute to life. The eternal contradiction: to live to have a life ...
